content:
Sept 2022 - Dec 2022
1. Dining Concierge Assistant https://github.com/vvangmj/dining-concierge-assistant
TLDR Built a Dining Concierge chatbot that sends users restaurant suggestions given a set of preferences that you provide the chatbot with through conversation. 2. AI Photo Album https://github.com/vvangmj/ai-photo-album
TLDR Implemented a photo album web application that can be searched using natural language through both text and voice. You will learn how to use Lex, OpenSearch, and Rekognition to create an intelligent search layer to query your photos for people, objects, actions, landmarks and more. 3. Spam Email Detector https://github.com/vvangmj/spam-email-detector
TLDR Implemented a machine learning model to predict whether a message is spam or not. And created a system that upon receipt of an email message, it will automatically ï¬‚ag it as spam or not, based on the prediction obtained from the machine learning model.

Group Project for Software as a Service
Motivation Being a kitchen killer? Clogging mountains of food into your refrigerator while having no idea how to cook? Wanna show off your culinary skills when thereâ€™s a friend visiting?
Our Demeter App will assist you in all these scenes! Tapping the ingredients you have and clicking the â€œsearchâ€ button, youâ€™ll get all recipes for your target food materials, with calories calculated for your meal. We care a lot for your appetite and your health on every day, and in every meal.
Demo Github https://github.com/vvangmj/Demeter

content:
Sept 2022 - Dec 2022
Group Project for Cloud Computing and Big Data
Motivation Nowadays, people tend to access information from the internet with their mobile devices during small and fragmented moments. Due to the fast living pace, they are not patient enough to read over tedious news articles while trying to understand whatâ€™s happening with merely a news title may be too hard and presumptuous. Hence, weâ€™re looking for an AWS service making it easier and more efficient for people to understand ideas of news through title, summary and important details retrieved from articles. With our News Feed application, people can not only save their time but also keep themselves up-to-date with the important and personalized news around the world.
Demo Project Report Read more here

title: Newsec - Recommend Interesting News for You in a Second

ğŸ”­Â Peaceful life with some adventures is the best for me.
Computer ScienceğŸ’» Majored in Computer Science for both undergraduation and graduation study.
3 years of learning CS experience in foundamental related courses (e.g. Algorithm, Computer Architecture, Computer Network, Operating System, …). 2 years of learning/research experience on Machine Learning & Graph Neural Network. 2 years of learning/working experience on Software Development & Infrastructure. These three experiences are timely overlapping, of course :-)
Currently have more interest in backend development and infrastructure. But will be happy to seek opportunities of learning frontend framework.
Related Tech Skills Languages: C/C++, Python, Go, Ruby, HTML, CSS, Java, Javascript, Matlab, SQL, Verilog Software Development Tools: Docker, Drone, Git, Kubernetes, Kafka, Airflow, Snowflake, PostgreSQL, Redis AWS Services: API Gateway, Lambda, DynamoDB, OpenSearch, S3, CloudFormation, CodePipeline, SES, SQS, Lex, SageMaker, EventBridge, Personalize, EMR Research Packages: PySpark, Pytorch, Flask, TensorFlow, Plotly, Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, Matplotlib Other Tools: Latex, GEM5, Quartus, Visio, Linux, Android Studio ArtğŸ­ğŸ¤ğŸ¬ My four comfort activities: Musicals, Immersive Plays, Pop Music, Film.
No idea why I am so addicted to it. Probabily because I am kind of introvert person who enjoys gaining happiness from external stuff other than interpersonal communication.
Musicals Just listing plays that I saw in-person.
Wicked: My musical enlightments. Watched it in London’s West End. Favorite song: “Defying Gravity”. Mozart, l’opÃ©ra rock: First musicals watched in China. Favorite song: “Vivre Ã  en crever”. RomÃ©o et Juliette: Not very impressed. But not bad at least. Dear Evan Hansen: First musicals watched in Broadway. Favorite song: “Waving Through A Window”. Phantom of the Opera: Classic. Must-to-see musical. Favorite song: “Phantom of the Opera”. Les MisÃ©rables: Fantastic performance. Completely exceeded expectation. Into the Woods: I love Gavin! Extraodinary and talented actor. Favorite song: “Agony”. Sleep No More (Immersive Work of Theatre) MY FAVORITE PERFORMANCE IN NYC!!
NOTHING IS BETTER THAN IT!!!
I WILL DEFINITELY RECOMMEND IT TO ANYONE VISITS NYC!!!
You will finally get your heartbreak in Mckittrick Hotel. But the most attractive part for me is that I was always full of hope and stress before entering it. There are so many mystery places and great experience to explore. Pop Music I am OK with any genre, so long as it meets my tastes.
Favorite Singers: Charlie Puth [I went to his concert this year!] Taylor Swift Shawn Mendes Ed Sheeran …. [Still so many other singers that I can’t list all of them hereğŸ¥²] Favorite Songs: Ehhh, actually I put different songs on repeat for different period. I may just share my 2022 playlist here :-)
Film Popcorn movies lover. Watch almost all popular fiction movies in cinema. Love the feeling of soaking myself into stories. Here are my favorite film IPs:
Marvel: Most favorite charactor is Loki. I LOVE villains. ğŸ¤¤ Harry Potter: Malfoy, my beloved! Pirates of the Caribbean: My dear Sparrow!!! Dune: No one can survive through TimothÃ©e’s eyes?! Doctor Who: 10th and 11th Doctors are the best! Game of Throne / House of Dragon: Needless to say. I paid for HBO membership just for these. Love, Death and Robots: One of the top animes I have ever seen. Life TrajectoriesğŸ—º Born in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, CN. Lived there until High School.
ğŸš—
High School in Fuyang, Zhejiang, CN.

Undergradution Study in Xi’an, Shaanxi, CN.

Gradution Study in New York City, NY, US.

title: About Me

content:
Feb 2022 - May 2022
Group Projects for Advanced Database
1. Google Search Query Modification https://github.com/vvangmj/cs6111proj1
TLDR In order to learn a more accurate query intended by user, we use Rocchio algorithm to extract the relevant keyword that can support the accuracy of original search query.
2. Search Query Expansion Based on SpanBERT Algorithm https://github.com/vvangmj/cs6111proj2
TLDR In order to expand raw and obsure query into a more specific query, we implement the Iterative Set Expansion algorithm to extracts specified high quality relation informations from at most 10 webpages that returned by Google Custom Search Engine, and updates the query which will be used in the next search iteration according to the extraction results.
3. Cause Analysis of Bus Breakdown and Delays Based on A-priori Algorithm https://github.com/vvangmj/cs6111proj3
TLDR Given a dataset which collects information from school bus vendors operating out in the field when encounter delays during the route, we learn the most possible reasons that contribute to bus breakdown and delays based on A-priori Algorithm.
